markermd 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Markermd Template

markermd_template.Rd

S7 class representing a complete markermd template with questions and metadata

Usage

markermd_template(
  original_ast = NULL,
  questions = list(),
  metadata = markermd_metadata()
)

Arguments

original_ast

rmd_ast. The original parsed AST from parsermd

questions

List of question objects

metadata

template_metadata. Template metadata
